mapper.select: SELECT a.qno AS qno, a.title AS title, a.content AS content, a.author AS author, a.resdate AS resdate, a.lev AS lev, a.par AS par, b.name AS NAME FROM qna a, member b WHERE a.author=b.id order BY a.par DESC, a.lev ASC, a.qno ASC, qno desc limit #{postStart}, #{postCount}
select * from qna where par=#{par} and lev=0
select * from qna where par=#{par} and lev=1

select qno, title, author, q.resdate from qna q join member m on(q.author=m.id) where par in (select par from qna group by par having count(par) < 2) order BY qno desc limit #{postStart}, #{postCount}
select count(*) from qna q join member m on(q.author=m.id) where par in (select par from qna group by par having count(par)<2)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qna GROUP BY par HAVING COUNT(par) = 1
mapper.insert: insert into qna values (default, #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, default, 0, default)
mapper.update: update qna set par=qno where par=0 and lev=0
update qna set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where qno=#{qno}
